Class ExternalCommandCertificateValidator

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, Cloneable, IUpgradeableData, CertificateProfileAwareValidator, CertificateValidator, PhasedValidator, Validator, ValidityAwareValidator, Profile, DynamicUiModelAware
    public class ExternalCommandCertificateValidator
extends CertificateValidatorBase
    External command certificate validator for multiple platforms.
    Version:

      • validate

        public List<String> validate​(CA ca,
                             Certificate certificate,
                             ExternalScriptsWhitelist externalScriptsWhitelist)
                      throws ValidatorNotApplicableException,
                             ValidationException,
                             CertificateException
        Description copied from interface: CertificateValidator
        Method that validates the public key.
        Parameters:
        ca - the issuing CA.
        certificate - the certificate to validate.
        externalScriptsWhitelist - a whitelist containing all scripts permitted to be executed
        Returns:
        the error messages or an empty list if the certificate was validated successfully.
        Throws:
        ValidatorNotApplicableException - when this validator is not applicable for the input, for example CVC certificate instead of X.509 or other type
        ValidationException - if the certificate could not be validated by the external command (exit code > 0).
        CertificateException - if one of the certificates could not be parsed.

      • getLabel

        public String getLabel()
        Returns:
        the type as a human readable name.

        public String getValidatorTypeIdentifier()

        Returns:

      • testCommand

        public List<String> testCommand()
                         throws DynamicUiCallbackException
        Tests the external command with the uploaded test certificate.
        Returns:
        a list with size > 0 and the exit code in field with index 0 and STDOUT and ERROR appended subsequently.
        Throws:
        DynamicUiCallbackException - if the external script path does not exist or accessible or the script call fails otherwise.
